thread.title: 1 block from Times Square
thread.title_full: 1 block from Times Square - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AndreanneBC
title: 1 block from Times Square
text: Really enjoyed the vibe of this hotel. Extra small room but very well designed, does not feel that small at all. Extra clean and modern bathroom. Breakfast not really a must, with everything available around. Think well about your choice of transportation to and from the hotel : traffic or blocked streets do cause trouble around there. Once on foot though, everything is right around the corner or up to a 10-15 minute walk.
